result.name: bath-enterprise-area-core-strategy-2014-policies-b1-b3-b5
result.notes: Core Strategy adopted 2014 Policies B1 B3 B5. Defines the boundary of a key area of change within Bath comprising a collection of development opportunity sites and buildings along the river corridor.

organization.name: bath-and-north-east-somerset-council
organization.title: Bath and North East Somerset Council
organization.description: BANES Council is a Unitary Local Government Authority covering Bath and the North East corner of Somerset, west of Bath, including Keynsham, Midsomer Norton, Radstock and Peasedown St John.
